name: Glastrier
flavorText: Glastrier emits intense cold from its hooves. It's also a belligerent Pokémon—anything it wants, it takes by force.

attacks.name: Freeze Down
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Wild Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.
